## An embedded Shiny app

This app is running on shinyapps.io. It might be included using knitr or iframe, but iframe does not seem to work on live site. 

```{r embed, echo=FALSE}
knitr::include_app("http://saslaw.shinyapps.io/GNIP-daily-0/", height="666px")
```

Apps must be embedded in iframes in order to work with static markdown. T
